posts.post_content:
The following t206 HOF'ers are for sale. Prices include shipping.
Money order, Check, Paypal all O.K. 

Chance   SGC 30 $80
Chesbro  SGC 30 $90
Davis      SGC 30 $65  ALL SOLD
Griffith    SGC 40 $90
Waddell   SGC 20 $80

Take all for $375.  First to post or email "I'll take it" gets it.
[URL="mhgt@embarqmail.com"]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/URL]
